#summary List of all keyboard shortcuts

= Keyboard Shortcuts =

== General prefix rules ==

|| *General rules* || *Windows Style* || *Linux Style* || *MacOS Style* || *Emacs Style* ||
|| Commands frequently used || Ctrl+   || Ctrl+         || Cmd+         || Ctrl+||
|| Commands rely on the current mode|| Alt+ || Alt+     || Ctrl+        || Alt+ ||
|| Commands used in all modes||Win+  || Win+         || Opt+          || Meta+||

|| quit program || Ctrl+Q || Ctrl+Q || Cmd+Q || Ctrl+X Ctrl+C ||

|| paste from clipboard || Ctrl+V || Ctrl+V || Cmd+V || Ctrl+Y ||
|| clear clipboard || Win+G || Win+G || Ctrl+G || Meta+G ||
|| search text || Ctrl+F || Ctrl+F || Cmd+F || Ctrl+S ||
|| replace text || Ctrl+R || Ctrl+R || Cmd+R || Ctrl+= ||
|| spell || Win+$ || Win+$ || Cmd+$ || Meta+$ ||
|| presentation mode || Ctrl+F9 || Ctrl+F9 || Ctrl+F9 || Ctrl+F9 ||
|| browse backward || Ctrl+< || Ctrl+< || Ctrl+> || Ctrl+< ||
|| browse forward || Ctrl+> || Ctrl+> || Ctrl+> || Ctrl+> ||
